name: Dr. Mor's Deadly Escape Room: A Puzzle to Die For
description: Dr. Mor (pen name) brings a unique perspective to the world of mystery fiction. By day, Dr. Mor works as a physician assistant, wielding their medical knowledge to diagnose and treat patients. By night, they transform into a skilled storyteller, weaving chilling medical thrillers under the pen name Dr. Mor. This dual life fuels Dr. Mor's writing, allowing them to craft realistic medical scenarios within their captivating narratives. Their 'Dr. Mors Diaries: Whispers from the Morgue' series offers a glimpse into the hidden world beneath the hospital facade, where secrets lurk and the dead whisper tales.
